Text:
Whoa this is magnificent! Many thanks!! Any chance we could get it in sd for those of us with crappy connections???
Thanks again!!
@Crokerite: SD has been already uploaded by others, search it, you will find it.

Awesome quality like always!! 

However the celebration part is a bit short. It does not have the player's kids joining in the celebrations on pitch!! Does your other 720p upload have it??

I wish you uploaded "Collectors Edition" version with the pre match, game, trophy, celebration like ur Champions League Final 8gb pack!!

Big fan of urs! Keep up the good work!!
